thread.title: Friendly staff, nothing too much trouble, clean hotel, convenient location.
thread.title_full: Friendly staff, nothing too much trouble, clean hotel, convenient location. - Review of Holiday Inn Express London - Hammersmith, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: sharonbillingsley33
title: Friendly staff, nothing too much trouble, clean hotel, convenient location.
text:
Believe this hotel has recently been refurbished, it is therefore clean and new. Rooms are spacious and comfortable, facilities in room ample for a short stay. Perfect location, being a few minutes walk from Hammesmith tube station. I needed flexibility for my stay, as I was booking on a day to day basis. This was not an issue, every single member of staff was helpful, professional and polite. Breakfast is served for all guests, and a small range of hot and cold foods available.
Will definitely return, and would recommend to anyone. It's rated 3*, but I would personally rate it higher.
Room Tip: I stayed in 3 different rooms, and the aach were equally good. See more room tips
